Alam 37-38 ah Jisu chong ngaikha hintia malet cha: “Tu ka-ang in atui araal inchu kei diang heiwa inlang khat-um juo-inro.  38  Pathian chong inthiang in iti angnga, ‘Ringna kanapeii tuiring ngai'n ama diang ka-inngamna tak miring suungnga aluongsik eii,’ ” Ezek 47:1; Zech 14:8
